name: 2022 the 14th International Conference on Computer and Automation Engineering
content: Paper Publication: All full paper submissions will be peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, technical merit and/or research content/depth, correctness, relevance to conference, contributions, and readability. The full paper submissions will be chosen based on technical merit, interest, applicability, and how well they fit a coherent and balanced technical program. Peer reviewed and presented papers will be published into ICCAE 2022 International Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases.
